attributes.action: Let young people vote on their future to Remain or Exit the EU
attributes.background: The UN Convention on the Rights of the Child says ‘when adults are making decisions that affect children, children have the right to say what they think should happen and have their opinions taken into account’.

rejection.details: It's not clear what you would like the minimum age for voting (if any) to be.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
